title: Peace Day
context: [ยง8-16] Peace Day. September 21 of each year shall be known and recognized as &ldquo;Peace Day&rdquo; to promote peace programs, improve international relations, and increase educational awareness of peace; provided that this day is not and shall not be construed to be a state holiday. All citizens shall be encouraged to observe and celebrate the blessings of peace and endeavor to create peace on Peace Day. [L 2007, c 23, ยง1]
